description: A towering volcano is depicted wearing a baseball cap and large square sunglasses. This personified geological feature rises behind a tropical landscape featuring thatched huts and canoes on a beach. The image presents an absurd and surreal deity presiding over a community. The juxtaposition of a formidable natural force with mundane, 'nerdy' attire creates a sense of ironic humor. This scene humorously imagines the god of a peculiar group known as the 'Nerdsians'.
caption: The volcano god of the Nerdsians
